De pronto yo fui a leer.
Todos los años yo iba a leer.
Every year I went to read.
I have gone to the movies.

De repente tú fuiste al cine.
(tú) Suddenly you went to the movies.

Él me dijo que tú ibas allí.
(tú) He told me that you went there.
(tú) You would go to the movies.
(tú) You have gone to the movies.

De pronto nosotros fuimos a leer.
Todas las mañanas nosotros íbamos al cine.
Every morning we went to the movies.

A esa hora él fue allí.
At that hour he went there.

Él me dijo que él iba a leer.
He told me that he went to read.
He has gone to the movies.
(ellas) Yesterday they went to the movies.

Todos los días ellas iban al cine.
(ellas) Every day they went to the movies.
